snippet: In a new ad, Bill de Blasio says he is the only candidate who will end stop-and-frisk tactics, though the word “only” is proving problematic for him.
abstract: In a new ad, Bill de Blasio says he is the only candidate who will end stop-and-frisk tactics, though the word “only” is proving problematic for him.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: De Blasio Speaks Against Stop-and-Frisk Tactics
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: De Blasio Positions Himself as ‘Only’ on Some Issues
